channel.title: Publications on Truthmaker Semantics
channel.description: Recent content in Publications on Truthmaker Semantics

item.title: Framework
item.description: Anglberger, Albert and Johannes Korbmacher . 2020. "Truthmakers and Normative Conflicts." In: Studia Logica 108(1): 49-83 . Fine, Kit. 2017. "A Theory of Truthmaker Content II: Subject-Matter, Common Content, Remainder and Ground." In: Journal of Philosophical Logic 46(6): 675-702 . ⸻. 2018. "The World of Truth-Making." In: Being Necessary: Themes of Ontology and Modality from the Work of Bob Hale : 36-60 . ⸻.

item.title: Applications
item.description: Fine, Kit. 2018. "Truthmaking and the Is--Ought Gap." In: Synthese : 1-28 . ⸻. 2019. "Verisimilitude and Truthmaking." In: Erkenntnis : 1-38 . ⸻. 2020. "Physicalism and the Identity of Identity Theories." In: Erkenntnis : 1-20 . Weiss, Yale. 2019. "Sextus Empiricus' Fourth Conditional and Containment Logic." In: History and Philosophy of Logic 40(4): 307-322 .
